DOC.brief_summary: Previous studies have shown that omega-3 fatty acid pills intake have beneficial effect on vascular health in overweight and/or hypertensive patients. However, there is a lack of studies showing the effect of everyday consumption of omega-3 fatty acids enriched food (not pills) on lipid profile and microvascular reactivity in healthy population. This study aimed to determine the effect of omega-3 enriched chicken eggs consumption on microvascular reactivity and lipid profile in young healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Omega-3 Fatty Acids Enriched Food and Microvascular Reactivity
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteers oral contraceptives drugs that could affect endothelium hypertension coronary artery disease diabetes hyperlipidaemia renal impairment cerebrovascular and peripheral artery disease
DOC.keyword: omega-3 fatty acids, microcirculation, laser Doppler flowmetry, lipid profile
